hidden_abilites: Quickly moves (dashes) to first target, quickly engages in battle, and casts a barrier that defends against 99% of damage for a short period.
When HP is under 30%, has a 70% chance to dodge enemy attacks.
Upon first appearing, increases movement and attack speed of all ally units.
Increases movement speed and attack speed of all units by 5%.
description.skill2: Increase attack power of elf unit in Guild War (3.6%, 7.2%, 10.8%, 14.4%, 18%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Wolf Warrior ]
